inn1.comm: off the mark in confident fashion, short of a good length on the off, rocks back and punches it through the covers for a boundary to raise a 1000 runs this year for the man in form in ODIs
smashed, banged it short outside off and Amla disdainfully smacked it over midwicket for a boundary, meaty pull
short of a good length on middle, punched off the back foot to mid-on
shortish on middle and off, knocks it down into the off side
a length delivery, defended off the front foot towards mid-on, good comeback
or so you thought, Shoaib serves up a short and wide delivery outside off and it's slashed over point for a one bounce four, Amla's not going to forgive those
short on middle and leg, worked away off the hips past square leg for a brace
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it towards midwicket
on target, bowls on a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it solidly back to the bowler
shortish on middle and leg, shuffles across to turn it into the leg side, is struck on the thighs and they manage to sneak in a leg bye
short of a good length outside off, dabs it towards third man for a single
nicely done, bowls it on a good length and induces Smith into playing a drive, the ball nips back in just a hint to beat the batsman through the gate
shortish on the off stump, punched crisply on the back foot past short extra cover for a couple of runs
short and quick, skids through as Amla tries to slash that from the crease, misses, it holds its line, Akmal does well diving to his left behind the stumps
angling towards middle, taps it off the back foot past mid-on for a single
bowls it fuller, on about a good length on the off stump, Smith gently plays it back to the bowler
slower one bowled short outside off, knocked towards Fawad Alam at point
Smith is fortunate, Shoaib held back the length there and Smith tried to whip that off the back foot, got an inside edge that went past the keeper and short fine leg
nicely done by Alam at point, slashed hard wide of him and it appeared to be heading for another boundary but Alam dived full length to his left and palmed it off, just the single
beaten, moved away this time, lands on a good length and shoots away just enough to escape the outside edge
pushes it a little wider, gets on the front foot and plays it to extra cover
full and it's dealt with, overpitched outside off and Smith leans forward to caress it through the covers
a touch too straight, on middle, gets forward and turns it away to midwicket, can't beat the in-field
easily done, gave him the charge and Razzaq held back the length but Smith backed himself, chipped it through the line, mid-off is slightly wide, and it beat him comfortably to the ropes
Amla had picked his spot, short of a good length on the off and he moved well across and flicked it fine, well past short fine
short and it's chopped and chopped hard towards Alam at point, straight to the fielder though
bowls it short on the off and he mistimes a pull to midwicket
opened the face on that one, angling in from outside off, ran it down to third man for a single
slower one bowled on the pads, closes the face on that one to turn it to midwicket
deceived by the slower one, varied his pace well did Shoaib and Smith didn't pick it, went through with that attempted chip shot again but found Afridi at mid-off
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot towards short extra cover
bowls it on a length this time, on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to mid-on
on a length again, pushed down the ground towards Yousuf at mid-on for a quick single, direct-hit but he was comfortably in
shortish outside off, trying to push it off the back foot, it moves away just a touch to take the outside edge, a single to third man
short on the off, punched past extra cover who palms it towards mid-off
Amla's looking dangerous...that wasn't even in the slot, bowled on a good length on the off and he stood his ground and just lofted it clean over extra cover for a boundary, all confidence
short of a good length outside off, bowled at 134.3 kmph, pushed off the back foot to cover
angling in towards middle, tucked towards square leg to pinch a quick single
superb shot, atrocious fielding, short of a good length and it's just a firm punch off the back foot, Afridi at mid-off slid to his left and let it through, should have been one and not four
Punished, short and wide, some tripe from Shoaib and the poor thing has been slapped mercilessly this time, over cover for another four
out comes the slower one, cutting in after pitching, worked towards midwicket
shot of the day, picked the slower one this time and found the gap perfectly, pitched up and he just stroked it between extra cover and the diving mid-off for four more
angling in towards middle, pushed back to the bowler, held its line
turning towards off from middle, Kallis presents the straight bat
keeps it flat and bowls it on a good length on the off, pushed straight to extra cover
flat again on middle, pushed back to the bowler, quiet start
gave it a bit of air this time, Kallis came down the track and drive it just wide of mid-on for a single
fires it on leg stump, worked away towards deep square leg for a single
drifting in on the off stump, a touch too close to cut which is what Amla was trying to do, chopped it to point
flighted outside off, driven hard towards extra cover, just the single
slowed it through the air, dabbed into the off side in front of cover for a quick single
well fielded off his own bowling, pitched up outside off and it's drilled back to the bowler, Afridi was brave enough to get his body behind it
quicker through the air, short of a good length, went for the cut, missed
no stopping Amla here, a bit of air from Afridi, was in the slot for Amla, landed full on middle and he hammered it over the bowler's head for a straight six
Rehman keeps it flat, on middle and off, Kallis plays it back to the bowler
trying to improvise is Kallis, made room before it was bowled, Rehman gave him a bit of width and Kallis smote that past a diving extra cover, just out of the man's reach
turned away into the leg side towards square leg
quicker one, pushed to a slightly deepish midwicket inside the circle for a quick single
on leg and middle, drops it in front of square leg and races off
makes room and the bowler chases him, driven down the ground to long-off
pitched on a good length on the off, driven through the line to long-off
cracked off the front foot through cover for another single
gave it some air, pitched up on the off, pushed back gently to the bowler
gets on the back foot and punches it towards deep cover
Amla continues his excellent run, punches it off the back foot to deep cover to raise his half-century, a fiery innings this
drops it short and Kallis pulls it over the in-field, over mid-on, for a brace
short ish outside off, gets back and cuts it point
gets on the back foot and works it square for a single
flighted on the off, gets across and drives it down the ground to long-on for a single
gave that a bit of air, pushed back down the pitch to the bowler
safe shot from Amla, flighted and it lands in the slot outside off, lofts it over mid-off, off the meat of the bat, for a one bounce four
on middle and leg, pushed down the ground to long-on to keep the strike
flighted outside off, cracked straight to extra cover
held back the length a little, dabbed towards cover
presses it away off the back foot through the in-field on the off side
pushed towards extra cover
gets forward and knocks it down back to the bowler
long hop landing on middle, drags it past midwicket for a couple of runs
gets on the back foot and slightly across and nudges it past square leg for a single
round the wicket this time, flighted on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted and it's in the gap this time, between long-on and deep midwicket for a well-run couple, Amla was being tested at the non-striker's end
worked towards square leg
flicked towards midwicket
gets on the front foot and knocks it towards midwicket again
angling in towards middle, gets across and drives it to midwicket
keeping a tight line, on and around off stump this time, defended just wide of the keeper
short of a good length on middle, played just wide of Younis at cover to snatch a quick single

Amla's gone, promised so much more this innings, would be terribly disappointed at having given his wicket away, was tossed up and it landed on a length outside off, he just lofted it through the line, straight into the palms of Shoaib waiting for it at long-off
angling in towards middle, dabs it onto the pitch
angling in towards middle from round the wicket, eased past cover for a single
pitched on middle and leg and it's driven back to the bowler
fires in a low full toss on middle, driven down to long-on for a single
pushed down the ground again to long-on to keep the strike

how bizzare, dropped into the off side and races for a single, Wahab and the non-striker are in a race and AB gets there first, the bowler can't restrain himself, collides with AB and ends up throwing the ball over the keeper towards fine leg instead of the stumps
eased into the off side through point and cover
gets forward and knocks that towards cover again
on middle and leg, pushed back past the bowler towards mid-on
just a fraction outside off, a tidy line, defended in front of the stumps, thinks of a single but it isn't there
short of a good length on the off, pushed towards extra cover
short of a good length, punched towards deep cover for a single
flighted it on the off, pushed it past the diving extra cover who could have put in a better effort, just the single
has kept it flat for the most part has Rehman, stands tall and knocks it past extra cover
on middle and leg, turned away towards midwicket
held its line from round  the stumps, tried to dab it into the off side, got an inside edge and it rolled into the leg side
found the gap, bowled it full outside off, reached for it and square-drove it elegantly to beat deep point to the boundary
pushed it towards mid-on and raced through for a single, an attempt at a direct hit  but he made it through comfortably
full and wide, stretches and caresses it towards deep cover
too much width, pitched up outside off and it's drilled past a diving extra cover, two more
Imperious from Kallis, just a firm punch and it was timed so well it raced to the long-off boundary, just bowled around a good length and he stood tall to knock it past mid-off
angling in from round the wicket, defended towards extra cover
comes down the track and drives it down towards long-off for a single
flighted on middle, driven down towards long-off for one more
Afridi stops that well, short of a length, it's cut well but the captain flings himself to his right to prevent any runs, returns a throw, the bowler misses and concedes a single
Rehman bowls it short on middle, pushed back to the bowler
gets on the front foot and pushes it towards extra cover
AB picks the gap, Hafeez  tossed it up outside off, AB got across, took it from a length and chipped it between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary

run-out appeal, Kallis has just made it back, it's pushed back to Hafeez and Kallis has backed up a bit, Hafeez reacts well, back-flicking it onto the stumps at the non-striker's end, Kallis stretched hard and made it back just in time
shortish, gets across and sweeps it down to deep square leg for a single
short of a good length on the off, gets back and punches it down to long-on
pushed it off the front foot back to the bowler
turned it away off the back foot towards deep midwicket for a single
tight line again, middle and off, AB steps forward and drives it past the bowler
pushed from the crease towards extra cover
not giving much air is Rehman, Kallis is content to play him watchfully, back to the bowler
slowed it down just a hint, Kallis came out of his crease, adjusted to the length, and pushed it back to Rehman
a bit of width this time, presses it away wide of extra cover
knocking it around, taps it past cover into the deep for one more
flighted on middle, pushed past the bowler to long-off
drifting in towards middle, gets across and works it to square leg
reached for the wide one and cut it slightly uppishly towards point
came down the track, dropped it in front of cover and took off
fullish delivery, all along the ground to long-off for a single
piercing the in-field quite comfortably now, dabbed past point for a single
short of a good length on middle, defended into the leg side in front of midwicket
defended into the off side this time, in front of cover
comes down the track and pushes it down to long-on
punched off the front foot past extra cover
quicker through the air, short on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on
excellent stuff from Rehman so far, Kallis plays it straight to extra cover
Afridi somewhat spoils the hardwork from Rehman at the other end, drops in a short on middle, pulled away over midwicket into a yawning gap
knocked away into the leg side for a single
Afridi is letting it slip here, tossed up and it's full outside off, Kallis steps forward, is down on one knee and creams it through extra cover for four more
pushed down towards long-on for a single, 150 up
nudged behind square for one more
stretches forward and taps it wide of the bowler for a single to raise his half-century, Half-century no.80 for Kallis, he's consolidated the innings well after losing Amla
hurls it short on middle, pulled away towards deep square leg for a single, uppish but safe
drops it short on middle, tucked into the leg side in front of square
slower one bowled slightly short on middle, waited for it to come on and defended it in front of point for a quick single
slower one bowled short outside off, AB just drops it into the leg side to squeeze in another run
short and wide, slashes hard at that one, will be disappointed he couldn't connect
slower one bowled full outside off, Kallis chases that one hoping to give it a good thwack but misses
a fraction short outside off, cracked towards deep cover for a single
bowls it short outside off, places it through the vacant cover region for a single
short and slightly wide, smacked towards deep cover for a single
slower one bowled short outside off, punched towards Umar Gul, substituting at long-off
picked the gap, short and wide, he's bowled a fair number of those in his second spell already, AB cuts it hard past point and there's no one in the deep
short of a good length outside off, guided towards third man to keep the strike
Wahab slips in a slower one, it's dropped in front of cover and they're off
takes forever to get to him, a short slower ball and Kallis mistimes an attempted cut, a single on offer nevertheless
short and wide, a touch too wide, AB wants to chase it but wisely decides against it, it's a wide
bowled on a good length on middle, nudged into the leg side for a quick one
pitched on a good length outside off, slices that over point for a single
slower one bowled short on middle, bunts it into the leg side but no single this time
slower one bowled much fuller, in a driving length outside off and AB, trying to crack it, makes no contact
tossed up on middle, swept away towards deep square leg
closes the face and turns it towards square
driven down the ground towards long-off for a single
short of a good length on the off, knocks it into th eleg side off the back foot
tossed up, lands full outside off, driven hard towards long-off for a single
slower one bowled short on leg stump, gets back and plays it cautiously into the leg side
consistent with the slower ones today, short on middle and it's pulled to deep square leg for a single
short of a good length outside off, dabbed towards third man for one more
AB's picking off the boundaries fairly easily, the fine leg is up and Wahab gifts the batsman a short ball down the leg side which is duly helped on its way
that's more like it..133.4 kmph, on middle and leg, nipped back in a hint, AB was cramped for space and could only fend it into the leg side
back to the slower ones, eases it down the ground to long-off
flighted on the off, turns the face to play it down to long-on
collision between Younis and AB as Kallis drives one past the bowler, no hard feelings in the end, a comfortable single taken
and amid the spate of singles and twos comes the boundary, short, long hop on middle and it's slapped through midwicket
gets forward and pushes it through cover to reach a well-paced half-century, Pakistan need to strike quickly
short and he drags it from outside off wide of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
on middle and leg, nurdled through the leg side for a single to keep strike
short of a good length outside off, turning in, waits for it and thuds it to deep extra cover
turning in from outside off, nudged in front of square
square-driven off the front foot past point for a single
short of a good length on the off, punched down the ground to long-on
raises a century-stand with a single to long-on, South Africa have had it easy in these middle overs
drops it short, it's pulled well but straight to deep square leg for a single
shortish on middle and leg, turned into the leg side towards Afridi at short fine
stopped on him before turning in, got a bit of a leading edge as he tried to turn the face
opens the face slightly to tap it towards short third man
short outside off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover, tidy again
extra cover into the action again, Rehman continues to keep South Africa quiet
gave it a bit of air this time, pushed past the bowler to long-on for a single
turning in from a good length outside off, defended it in front of the keeper
tossed up outside off, drove it just wide of Afridi who misfielded yet again to allow the pair a single
works it off the back foot wide of midwicket
blocks it in front of cover to knock off one more
flighted outside off, driven hard past extra cover, by the time the fielder in the deep cuts it off they're back for the second
fires it on the leg stump, AB tries to whip it away into the leg side, is struck on the pads, would have been going down
defended off the front foot in front of point
eased past point for a single
short outside off, waits for it to turn away does Kallis and slashes it past point for a couple of runs
sliding it on the pads, nudged past square leg for a single
short on middle, gets slightly across and twists it towards square leg
flighted on middle, forces it down the ground to long-on
into the V again, long-on once more in action
short on the off, punched off the back foot in the direction of long-on again
four in a row in that direction
into the off side this time, defended off the front foot
a short ball down the leg side, AB can't quite get to it but it's a wide
slightly short on middle, tried to pierce it past midwicket but found the fielder
dot ball, blocked into the leg side, was a flattish delivery
and again, not much turn but pretty accurate, played back to the bowler
short outside off this time but he has cover in the in-field on the off side, chopped to point
makes room and flays that straightish delivery towards deep cover for a single
fullish on middle, another dot ball from Rehman, played back to the bowler
holds back the length, gets back to work it past midwicket, the end of an excellent spell from Rehman
flighted outside off, gets across and drives it back to the bowler
Hafeez strikes, AB had timed that well, fetched a fullish delivery from outside off and chipped it firmly, was aiming to clear midwicket but found Younis who reacted sharply
shortish on middle, gets off the mark with a punch to long-on
fullish on middle, played it along to long-on for one more
turns the face to tuck it behind short fine for a single
turning in from outside off, drops it down in front of point
pushed past extra cover  for a single to make it 11001
punched past the bowler on the off side
drives it down towards sweeper cover for a single
cut away past point for a single

short outside off, Kallis was tempted into playing the cut, didn't get hold of it, got a bit of elevation and Wahab, placed at short third, runs in a few steps and dives forward to snap it inches from the ground, good athletic effort from the bowler, Kallis has to go
almost in the blockhole, dug out into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
round the wicket to the left-hander, pushed to extra cover
fires it into the leg stump from round the wicket, tries to force it through the leg side, is struck on the pads

run-out, Pakistan are fighting back, pushed just wide of extra cover and sets off for a single, Rehman, who's bowled an excellent spell, picked it up moving to his right and aimed accurately at the stumps at the non-striker's end to find Ingram well short. That's three wickets in three overs.
held its line, short on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on
appeal for lbw, goes for the sweep straightaway, is struck outside the line as it turns in from outside off
floats it on a good length outside, played into the leg side harmlessly
short on the off, gets back and jabs it towards deep midwicket for a single
fullish on the off stump, dabs it into the leg side for a quick single
the offspinner there, on and around off, Duminy gets forward and defends solidly
pushed off the front foot towards extra cover
shortish outside off, chops it past point for a single
short of a good length outside off, 90 kph, chopped to point from the crease
gets on the back foot and pushes to extra cover
pushes him back and he knocks it into the leg side
gets forward and drives it elegantly towards long-off for a single
a quicker delivery on leg stump, sweeps it down to fine leg for a single
lands on a good length on the off, gets forward and plays it back to Hafeez
another quiet over from Hafeez, pushes it back to the bowler
the googly, nipped in from outside off and struck him on the waist as he tried to turn it square
turned in, the googly again, took the top of the pad and evaded the keeper for a couple of runs
flighted on middle, driven down the ground to long-on, they're rushing through their overs here
stretches forward and taps it to long-on again
slightly short on the off, knocked wide of cover and calls for a single, makes it easily
out comes the reverse-sweep, Botha used that shot well in the previous game, there is a deep point in place, just the single
saw him come down and dropped it slightly short, pushed back to the bowler
tried to force that fuller delivery through cover, got an inside edge onto his pads
another dot ball, drifting in towards middle, nudges it back down the pitch
gave it some air, came down the track and drove it down the ground for a single
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on
ooh, just managed to chip it above extra cover, they scamper back for the second and make it just in time taking on Shoaib's throw
that breaks the boundary-drought, the googly, tossed up outside off, reverse-swept it between point and cover, found the gap
tossed up on middle, plays it down past Afridi for a single
pitched up outside off, driven to long-off to raise the 250
way down the leg side and Umar Akmal fumbles, allowing one more run
pushed towards extra cover who appears to misfield but recovers well to prevent the single
slightly short on middle and leg, nudged into the leg side wide of midwicket
slower one on middle and leg, dropped into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
fullish and he chases it, slices it over point but there is cover in the deep, just the single as it gets to that fielder on the bounce
inswinging yorker on middle, dug out well towards long-on, Wahab bowled a couple of such beauties the previous game
pitched up and moved away to beat the outside edge as Botha tried to drive it through cover
full, a touch too full, and wide but Botha, trying to get to it, can't quite connect
a desperate swipe from Botha and it pays dividends, short of a good length and he was eying midwicket, got a thick outside edge over the wicketkeeper to the third-man boundary
lovely shot from Duminy, pitched up on the off from round the wicket, Duminy made room and lofted it over mid-off for a one bounce four
smacked, another four, picked the slower one, on a length on leg stump and he walked across to swipe it over midwicket for another boundary, covering lost ground now are South Africa
Mid-on had been brought up and Duminy cashed in against that full delivery, on leg stump and it's drilled past the diving fielder for a boundary, three in a row
he'll feel he missed out there, made room and that was another ball in the slot, tried to loft him over extra cover but couldn't get to it
yorker on middle from round the wicket, digs it out wide of short fine leg for a couple of runs
Shoaib's woes continue, he's trying for the yorker but is ending up pitching them on a length, smashed over the bowler's head to make it 18 in the over
a couple for Botha as he steers that widish delivery behind point and wide of third man for a couple of runs
a slower one bowled down the leg side, was an attempt at a chinaman-ish slower ball
Botha moved across and swung it past midwicket, Razzaq at mid-on gave chase, tumbled and hauled it in to keep them to three
lovely from Duminy, pre-meditated, low full toss down the leg side, trying for a yorker, Duminy moves across and paddles it for four more
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, dabbed it in front of point for a quick single
full, swinging in, Botha takes it from a length and flicks it towards midwicket where Yousuf is waiting right at the edge of the circle
short and it's dealt with, slower one gone bad, Duminy picked it, adjusted to the length early and hammered it over midwicket
inswinging yorker, superbly bowled on middle, dug out into the leg side for a single
a full toss outside off, made room and chipped it over the in-field on the off side, they run two comfortably and took the the third on the throw which was a terrible one
well done, inswinging yorker again, on the off stump, dug out past point
Duminy made room and Shoaib chased him, bowled it short and was pulled over square leg for a couple of runs
full on middle, made room and lofted it just wide of long-off for two more

beautifully placed, that was a yorker on middle and off, Duminy made room and squeezed it between point and cover for four more, not Shoaib's day, Duminy raises his half-century and South Africa have reached a formidable total with an over still to go
full toss outside off, well kept by Akmal as Botha gets an edge and it gets to him on the bounce, Botha kept running straight, blocking the wicketkeeper and Wahab Riaz's view, a single taken
a well-run couple, mistimes a pull but the fielder in the deep takes a while to gather that shot hit in the direction of deep midwicket, two more
finds the gap, picked the slower one again, Wahab tried to chase him as he made room but Duminy swivelled and sent it over square leg for four more
swinging in towards middle, made room and tapped it wide of extra cover for a single
lands safely, had made up his mind to play the scoop but the length just wasn't right, got a top edge and it landed near square leg
well done Wahab, they steal a bye though, made room and he bowled it wide, Duminy failed to reach it

inn2.comm: jaffa to begin with, lands on a good length outside off and shoots away to beat the outside edge as he prods forward
held it back a hint, bowled at 138 kmph, moved away from a good length and he left it alone this time
a bit of swing there, away swing, fuller this time, gets across and defends it with an open face to point
bowls it on a good length on the off, gets half-forward and defends it off the meat to extra cover
shaping away from the right hander there, just around good length and moving away, not much width, left alone to the keeper
nicely stroked wide of mid-off for a single, pitched up this time, just pushed it through the in-field
short of a good length on middle, nipped back in to catch him on the thigh
short delivery but bowled down the leg side, tried to whip it fine, called by the umpire
lands on a good length outside off and holds its line, Shahzaib leaves it alone
bowls it on a good length outside off, gets across and drives it down to mid-on
drops it on a good length on the off, gets forward and defends him solidly to extra cover
pitched up this time, pitched outside leg and nipped away towards middle and off, went across to drive it through the leg side, was rapped on the pads but that can't be given
pitched up on the off stump, gets forward and drives it straight to mid-off
swinging away, bowled full on middle, closes the face to drive it towards mid-on
angling in towards middle and moving away just a hint, gets front and across and pushes it to mid-on
a gift from Steyn, bowls it fullish on middle and leg and it's clipped elegantly over midwicket for a boundary
beautifully timed, short of a good length, opens the face slightly and just punches it between cover and point for a couple more
nice carry to the keeper,  bowled at 145.5 kmph, pitched on a good length and moved away, shoulders arms to let it through
lovely hit, pitched on a good length, he leant forward and lofted it cleanly over mid-off for a one-bounce four, beautifully timed
four more, length ball outside off and Shahzaib hits through the line, smacking it over mid-off for another one
bowled from slightly wide of the crease, angling in towards middle and off, defended onto the pitch
on target, bowled at 124.8 kmph on middle and off, defended to extra cover from the crease
gets it on a good length outside off, gets across and works it past square leg for a single
shortish on middle and leg, nips back in to catch him on the hips
Steyn bowls it on a good length on middle, gets across and turns it away past square leg for a couple
the innings is gaining in momentum now, pitched up outside off and he sliced it over point, went off the bottom end of the bat, for a boundary
with more intent this time, waiting for it to move away, gets forward and chips it cleanly over cover for four more
good comeback, short of a good length and getting it to nip away, squared up the batsman there as he poked at it outside off stump
slightly short on the off, defended off the back foot towards cover
and again, short of a good length, moving away, prodding at it but can't make contact, is fortunate not to
called a wide, moving away after pitching, the batsman chases it but can't reach
shortish on middle, jabs it past midwicket for a couple of runs
pitched up on the off, driven down the ground but straight to mid-on
bowls it on a good length on middle and off, gets forward and defends it towards mid-off
pitched up on the off, driven soundly off the front foot but it's well fielded by Smith at mid-off who keeps them to one
targeting middle and off, gets across and turns it past square leg for a single
pitched on a good length, gets across and presents a straight bat
starts with a big wide down the leg side, angling well down
short on middle, pulled over square leg, didn't get hold of that one, got it high on the bat but it landed safely, two more
down the leg side again, tries to glance it fine, can't get his bat to it, wide again
nips back in a hint from outside off, defended back to the bowler
pitched up and it's dealt with, full and wide and he slices it over point, finds the gap and it's four more, good confident start
drops short of Amla, a bit of extra bounce there, gets on the back foot and Hafeez wasn't sure where to play it, chipped it and it landed just in front of Amla running in from mid-on
expensive start this for Morne, tucked away off the back foot behind square for a couple more
angling in towards middle, gets across and taps it towards square leg
short of a good length outside off, gets forward and tries to drive that on the up, mistimes it towards extra cover
lovely timing but hits the stumps at the non-striker's end, just a firm push down the ground
bowls it on a good length on the off, driven through the line to mid-off for a single
short on middle, tried to pull it square, got a top edge over the keeper and it rolled towards the ropes, the runs keep flowing
short of a good length on the off, defended towards cover
good, tight line this time, goodish length on the off, gets on the back foot and defends in front of cover
edged and four, chases a widish delivery from Morne, tries to drive him on the up past mid-off, gets a thick edge well wide of Botha at first slip
pitched up on the off, driven down just wide of mid-off for a single
Shahzaib's backing himself here and is pulling it off, good length ball that is struck through the line over mid-on, four more
shortish, drops his hands on that one and dabs it behind point for a single
bowled short on middle, adjusts to the length early and pulls it hard towards deep square leg
short on middle, gets front and across and turns it behind short fine leg for a single to keep strike
straying on the pads with the fine leg up is not a good idea, works it fine towards the close-in fielder
bowls it on a good length on the off, drops it in front of midwicket for a quick single
overpitched and there to hit, struck through the line to mid-off
fine leg is up and that shot works perfectly when that is the case, fullish on the off, Hafeez bends low and paddles it over short fine for a boundary
angling it away from the right hander, tries to crack it through point but it evades the outside edge
short and it's cut hard but straight to Duminy at point who fields well, getting his body behind it
short of a good length outside off, runs it down to third man for a single
Hafeez is looking good, pitched up and he plays a textbook cover drive for a boundary, there is a deep cover in place but he had no chance
short of a good length outside off, runs it down to third man
shortish delivery, plays it down towards short fine for one more
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and drops it in front of point
an excellent start this, slower ball bowled full and it's picked and drilled back down the ground, Kallis gets a foot to it but it has enough in it to carry to the ropes
angling it towards off stump from slightly wide of the crease, defended into the leg side towards midwicket
played that well, short ball on middle, rolled his wrists over it to play it wide of Botha at deep square leg for two more
swings and doesn't connect, bowled at 126 kmph, cut away after pitching, Shahzaib was eying the deep midwicket boundary, misses
fuller delivery just outside off, leans into the drive and plays it to extra cover
short delivery outside off, guided down to third man for a single
uppishly played, on a length on the off and he squeezed it into the vacant cover region, safe in the end, just the single to keep the strike
shortish outside off, slashed down to third man for a single

gone! That chip shot has worked well for Shahzaib this innings but not this time, was slightly short of a good length and he was trying to hit through the line and clear mid-on, got it slightly high on the bat and it went straight to Morkel at mid-on
nicely played, welcomed with a short ball and he tries to get on top of it, drops it down to point
bowls it on a good length, Younis gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
short and he tried to guide that to third man, caught him on the handle and popped up but landed safely, he's off the mark
back of a length, runs it down with an open face to keep the strike, a much-needed wicket for South Africa in that over
shortish outside off from Morkel, Hafeez cuts it down to third man
shortish, gets on the back foot and punched behind point for a single
slower one bowled slight short outside off, cut back in, tries to run it down again, gets an inside edge on the pads
angling in towards middle, played back to the bowler from the crease
short of a good length, guided to Duminy off the back foot at point
good length on the off, nicely timed drive towards mid-off, straight to the fielder though
driving length outside off and Younis plays what the ball demands but straight to the fielder
held back the length this time, gets back and eases it to deep cover for a single
a bit of width, opened the face and played it square, wide of Morkel at third man to scamper back for the second
nicely done, short outside off, got on top of it and played it down to third man for a single

gone! Kallis bowls a short one on middle and leg, Younis swivelled to pull it fine, it went through to AB who took it above his head, big appeal from the bowler and keeper and Harper gives it out. Younis didn't appear to be too happy with the call, we need to check the replays to see if he got a glove to it. We'll only get the replay after drinks. Replays confirm that he did get a glove to it, that was out
starts solidly with a firm defence back to the bowler, short of a good length and he was nicely behind it
short outside off from Morne, taps it towards point
worked away behind square leg for a single this time
shortish on middle, turns it past midwicket and rushes through for a single, a needless throw at the stumps results in an overthrow
short of a good length outside off, drops it in front of point
short, on the ribs, whipped behind square towards fine leg for a single
slower one bowled on middle and leg, got across and clipped it off his pads, Morne has his hands on his head wondering what might have been had he missed it
short of a good length outside off, runs it down to third man for a single

that's out, that went off the face, Kallis takes three, it was a shortish delivery that nipped back in and Yousuf was looking to guide it to third man, opened the face and guided it straight into AB's gloves as he dived to his right
on middle and leg, Alam walks across and pushes it towards midwicket
shortish outside off, has given him a bit of room, chops it past point for a single
just short of Botha, almost another wicket, short ball again, went for the pull, mistimed it as it went off the bottom of the bat, Botha at midwicket took it on the half-volley
attempted bouncer, goes for the pull, a bit of a top edge but it lands short of fine leg, nervy times for Pakistan
short of a good length on middle, punched back to the bowler
short and pulled powerfully but can't beat Ingram who runs across from deep midwicket to keep them down to two with a dive in the deep, Hafeez reaches his half-century but he has a long way to go
slower one bowled short outside off, eased past cover into the deep for a single
round the wicket to Fawad, bowled full on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
edged and gone, South Africa have edged ahead here, short of a good length outside off, Fawad looks to run it down towards third man, gets a faint edge and AB makes no mistake
beaten, short of a good length again, pretty pacy, moved away to beat the outside edge as he fished for that one
tossed it up on the off, turning in just a hint, defended into the leg side
dropped, flighted outside off and it's slog-swept hard straight to midwicket where Duminy can't quite hold on, sharp chance gone down
pushed down the ground to long-on for a single
turning in from the off, turned down towards short fine
tossed up outside off, reaches forward and drives that wide of long-off for a single
long hop and he cashes in, waits for it to turn in, rocks back and slaps it over midwicket for a welcome boundary
shortish on middle, rocks back to play it wide of mid-on
short of a good length, dabbed off the back foot in front of deep midwicket, big vacant space inside the circle and they have enough time to come back for the second
angling in towards middle and leg, shuffled across to drive it past midwicket, gets an inside edge onto the pads
punched off the back foot towards mid-on and he's raced through for a quick single, dived to make it in time
slower one bowled short outside off, got back and dropped it in front of point, thought of a single which wasn't there
slower one again, knocks it behind point for one to keep strike
sharp turn, good bounce too, on middle and leg, turned behind square
gets forward, opens the face and knocks it in front of cover for a single
comes down the track and chips it but short of long-on, South Africa were excited for a moment there
tries to turn it into the leg side, is struck high on the pads
round the wicket for the final ball, pushed full outside off, pressed past extra cover for a single
shortish on the off, whipped past midwicket for a single
a bit of turn away from the batsman, punched off the back foot to extra cover
shortish on middle, punched slightly uppishly towards long-on
turned the face a little too early on that one, bowled full on middle, got a leading edge that fell short of extra cover

appeal for lbw, that looked out, angled in towards middle and off, landed there and held its line, Umar was looking to work it away towards midwicket, missed and was rapped on the pads, umpire Ghauri didn't think that was going on towards middle but it certainly looked like it
pushed back to the bowler
turning in, opens the face and plays it to point
good turn there, played down towards square leg for a single

Hafeez goes that was a soft dismissal, came down the track to a fullish delivery and chipped it with little intent towards a perfectly-positioned Kallis at long-on, had worked hard enough to build the innings and give Pakistan a sound start but has squandered it
fetches it from outside off and sweeps it past square leg for a single
round the wicket to Afridi, short ball to begin with, slapped from the crease to deep cover to open his account
sharp turn for Peterseon, looping in and shooting away after pitching, Afridi was looking to turn it into the leg side, was beaten
creamed down the ground towards long-off for a single
flighted outside off, slices it towards point
sharp turn and bounce, shot up after pitching and Umar was wise to withdraw from that shot
gets a big stride forward and plays it back to the bowler
pushed through the off side past cover for a single
went on straight, pushed it quick, Umar played for the turn and it just escaped the outside edge
short outside off, turned in, he waited for it and cut it towards deep point for a single
gets on the back foot and works that past square leg for a single
shortish delivery outside off, dabbed in front of point for one more
round the wicket, Afridi stepped out, almost yorked himself and dug it out towards long-off for a single
nicely cut away, trusting the turn and bounce, rightly so, moved away and slashed it past point for a couple
Afridi takes aim, targets the wide long-off boundary, lofted high but didn't get the desired distance, a couple wide of Amla at long-off
pushed off the front foot straight to extra cover
on the back foot and eased past point for a single
flighted on middle, worked in the vacant midwicket region for one more
two more, short of a good length, waited for it to turn away and chipped it over extra cover into the deep
angling in towards middle, pushed just wide of extra cover for a single
Pakistan will be hoping that's the first of many, tossed up, lands on middle and he slog-sweeps it into the crowd over deep midwicket
waits for it to turn in and blocks it in front of square leg for a single
tossed up outside off, pushed towards extra cover
fires that one hard on leg stump, can't get his bat to it as he tries to turn it away
turned in from a good length on the off stump, defended to extra cover

long hop and Umar Akmal picked the length early, rocked back and pulled it flat towards deep midwicket, landed on the ropes, six more, these two are trying to pull things back and have done well so far
short and wide, tries to cut that hard but makes no contact

appeal for caught-behind, Smith is livid that wasn't given, angled in from slightly wide of the crease, landed just outside off and Afridi tried to open the face, they all thought he nicked it but there was no sound on first sighting, but upon watching the replay there is one, difficult decision, the bowler, Smith and the keeper were confident. Difficult to say, really. Not after having watched snicko though, it confirms there was an edge. Ghauri the man again
looked to flick it fine, clipped the pads and AB keeps well, diving to his left
defended off the back foot
short ball and is dealt with, pulled away over midwicket for a boundary
worked away behind square for a single to keep strike
fired down the leg side and AB didn't get behind it, Afridi had made room and he chased him but that was way down, five wides, things are heating up now
flighted on middle and leg, turned behind square for a single
waited for it to turn in, cuts it straight to point
gets forward and taps it towards point off the front foot
flighted on middle, driven down towards long-on for a single
turning in from a good length on the off, defended on the pitch
shortish outside off, dabs it just wide of point for one more
short of a good length on middle, taps it down in front of midwicket
wide again, a touch too wide, slashes hard, misses, called a wide
guided down towards third man for a single
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it to cover
back of a length again, waits and taps it down to point
pushes it a little fuller, tries to open the face and crack it through point but can't connect
short of a good length on the off, mistimes a pull to midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, played into the vacant midwicket region for a single
stumped, Afridi has been sent back, kept it flat this time, Afridi had made his mind up, came down the pitch, swung hard and missed as it turned away from a good length outside off, AB did the rest
tossed up outside off, driven towards extra cover
angling in towards off, fullish, driven to extra cover again
pitched up on middle, driven straight back to the bowler
turned away from middle to take the outside edge but Razzaq played it with soft hands and it just rolled down to point
nips in towards middle, defended into the leg side, Razzaq calls for a single but Akmal rightly sends him back, would have been a suicidal run
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and defends it on the pitch
slower one bowled short outside off, dabbed just wide of the keeper, three dots in a row, the pressure builds
shortish outside off, cut down to third man for a single
finds the gap, was short on middle and he bisected the gap between deep square leg and fine leg perfectly, pulling it square

didn't go in the intended direction but gets four nevertheless, was a fullish delivery and he aimed at extra cover, got a thick inside edge that took it wide of Botha at mid-on and all the way to the boundary
short on middle, turns away, makes room and cuts it towards deep point for a couple of runs
Akmal steps out to clear extra cover, the bat turns in his hand and he can only manage a single to midwicket
pitched up on the off, pushed straight to extra cover
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it into the off side
waited for it to turn away and tapped it wide of point for a single
angling in towards middle, watchfully played out into the off side
Steyn is back and finds the edge, of the inside variety, straight away and it heads down to fine leg
Razzaq gets more of a full face on this and is rewarded with nothing, finding point
Steyn is always happy to go full, searching for some kind of swing either conventional or reverse, here he finds nothing but the middle of a well-timed drive to deep cover
Steyn is bowling rather briskly here and Akmal is hurried on a back-foot defence
this time there is enough width for Akmal to steer down to deep point
while Razzaq is there South Africa won't breath easily and he looks very calm, as always, working this to deep midwicket to keep the strike
uppish drive clears the infield and bobbles out to deep cover
bang! Have all of that! Akmal dances down the wicket and in a flash of the bat has sent this miles over long-off, glorious shot
good response! Touch of flight and bite off the surface, beating the outside edge
good running earns Akmal two as he glances this out to deep midwicket
turned round the corner with a flick of the wirsts
cry of "catch" from de Villiers as Razzaq drives one-bounce to cover
Steyn finds the right line, the right length and leaves very little to do but block

dropped! Steyn is furious and Akmal has six! Slower ball that Akmal slaps straight to Ingram on the long-on boundary, he fluffs the chance, tipping it over the rope, powerful strike but should have gone
good response, quick and straight and Akmal defends
enough width here for Akmal to work down to third man
shorter ball, pins Razzaq back and he defends in a hurry
slower ball, much slower, the line was excellent though and Razzaq could only defend carefully
good flight and line from Peterson, Akmal very carefully defends
another watchful defence from Akmal, sniffing the ball to block
Akmal turns his hands over this to send it down to midwicket for a single, he wants two but there is no chance
Peterson switches to around the wicket and finds an outside edge the loops away for a single towards cover
fifty for Akmal! Good knock it's been too, reaches the landmark by glancing into the leg side
attempted sweep finds short fine leg
slower ball bowled full outside off, Razzaq chases it but can't reach it
short of a good length outside off, moves away and taps it wide of point for a single
nicely played, waited for it and opened the face at just the right time to guide it down to third man for a single
lands on a good length outside off, mistimes a drive to mid-off
short of a good length outside off, Razzaq looks to cut, makes no contact
a couple, fullish delivery, made room and square-drove it hard past point, Kallis ran across, dived and kept them down to two
tossed up on middle, swings it away towards deep square leg for a single
turning in from a good length on the off, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, comes down the track to drive it down the ground, gets an inside edge on the pads
fires a short one outside off, cut away behind point for a couple of runs
flighted it outside off, dug out wide of cover
that's disappeared! Flighted, Razzaq chanced his arm, came down the track, picked it from the slot and deposited it over long-on for a massive six
starts with a  boundary, Umar Akmal made room to that fullish delivery and flayed it past a diving extra cover, the crowd is up on its feet
well down the leg side, he made room and Morkel chased him, AB's done a good job behind the stumps and he covered that well
moved well across, was a low full toss just down the leg side and he tried to paddle it fine, fell over and was fortunate it didn't clip the stumps, not called a wide
full outside off, made room and steered it straight to cover, thought of a single but decided against it in the end
there is a long-off in place now and he drives that wide of him, slightly uppishly, for a couple of more runs
pitched up on the off, drilled down the ground to long-off for one more
full and Razzaq wanted to absolutely cream it through the covers, missed

Gone, full toss and he's timed that well but straight into the palms of Smith at extra cover right at the edge of the circle, off the meat and he was looking to clear the in-field but didn't get the desired elevation
full outside off, squeezes it wide of point for a quick single
bowls it full on the off, drilled down the ground for a single to long-off
poor ball by Steyn, bowls a full toss on the pads and it's clipped away fine, three more as Tsotsobe gives chase, a good throw to the keeper's end but Razzaq is in
pitched up outside off, struck straight to extra cover for a single
another misdirected delivery from Steyn, low full toss on the pads and Wahab flicks it away past short fine for a boundary, good start to his innings
angling in towards middle and leg, tries to clip it fine, is struck on the pads
bowled full on the off, almost in the blockhole, plays it back to the bowler
well struck, round the wicket and it was bowled full on middle, was cannoned down the pitch past Tsotsobe, he's warmed up well so far as Razzaq
fires it down the leg side, pressure on the bowler, wide called
low full toss just wide of off, pushed wide of extra cover to steal a single
full toss outside off, opens the face to play it to point
Razzaq makes room and drives that low full toss down the ground just wide of long-on for a couple of runs

he strikes, Riaz tried to improvise by playing the reverse-sweep, that was pitched outside leg and it turned in, he got the top edge while trying to clear the in-field and found Morkel at short third who held on to a well-judged catch
good length on middle, gets across and turns it to midwicket
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and whips it past square leg for a single

pitched outside leg stump and turned in but was still outside leg, called a wide, Smith's having a word with the umpire because Razzaq had given himself way too much room before the ball was delivered
lands on a length on leg stump, tickles it towards short fine for a single
fullish, gets forward and turns it down fine
shortish on middle and leg, jabs it towards square leg for one more
full toss on middle, smacks it hard but straight to long-on for a single
shortish outside off, opens the face and guides it down to third man
superbly fielded in the deep, it was drilled down the ground, Duminy ran across from long-on, dived full length and palmed it to Botha at long-off, just the couple in the end

that's the decisive blow, pitched up outside off, Razzaq had to go for it and tried to clear long-off but it was a miscue in the end, landed straight into the hands of Johan Botha in the deep and the spectators are now beginning to leave
flicks the stumps on the way to the keeper, pitched up and Abdur Rehman went after it, swung hard, missed and it grazed the stumps on the way to AB
swing and a miss again, full outside off and he makes no contact
tossed up, tries to slog it away, gets an inside edge to midwicket
looking for the slog again, inside edge towards short fine
Rehman isn't giving up, comes down the track to the pitch of the ball and smacks it over the bowler's head for a flat six
comes down the track again, drives it past extra cover for a single
It's all over, Shoaib was caught in two minds there, stepped out of the crease, then went back when the ball was pitched slightly short, tried to chop it into the off side, missed and was bowled
